business_model.rationale: Freemium model attracts large user base with unlimited core features while monetizing advanced analytics and insights. Addresses user frustration with artificial limits while providing clear premium value.

features: Visual dot calendar with full history
Streak counting and basic progress visualization
free_tier.purpose: Provide full core value to build trust and engagement while creating natural upgrade path to analytics

monthly_subscription.positioning: Affordable premium insights for habit tracking enthusiasts
monthly_subscription.target_market: Users wanting deeper understanding of their habit patterns

annual_subscription.positioning: Best value for committed habit builders with long-term insights

conversion_tactics: Show analytics value during trial with actual user data
Progressive feature introduction throughout trial period
Gentle reminder notifications 7 days and 1 day before trial ends
Contextual upgrade prompts when viewing limited analytics

paywall_configuration.presentation_style: Modal with clear value proposition and dismissible close button
dismissal_rules: Always dismissible with visible X button
Swipe down to dismiss on iOS

sdk_configuration.initialization_location: App.tsx at startup before any screens render
sdk_configuration.logging_level: debug in development, warn in production

error_handling: Clear error messages for network issues
Retry button for failed restore attempts
Contact support option for unresolvable issues

onboarding_hooks: Show preview of analytics during habit creation
Demonstrate pattern visualization with sample data
Highlight export capabilities during first week of usage
progressive_feature_unlock: Day 3: Show first correlation insights preview
Day 14: Full analytics dashboard with trial prompt
social_proof_elements: User testimonials about insights helping habit formation
Statistics about average user habit improvement with analytics

engagement_features: Habit suggestion engine based on patterns
churn_prevention: Exit survey to understand cancellation reasons
Pause subscription option instead of immediate cancellation
Personalized win-back offers based on usage patterns
winback_campaigns: New feature announcements to former subscribers
Limited-time discount offers for previous users

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Higher trial conversion at $1.99 monthly price point
pricing_experiments.test_description: A/B test $1.99 vs $2.99 monthly pricing for new users
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: 15%+ increase in trial conversion with maintained LTV

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Annual plan conversion improves with 3-month option
pricing_experiments.test_description: Test quarterly plan at $8.99 as middle option between monthly and annual
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: 20%+ increase in users choosing longer-term commitments

standards_compliance.subscription_store_compliance: RevenueCat integration handles all subscription lifecycle management, platform-compliant restore flows, proper grace periods and billing retry logic per App Store and Google Play requirements
standards_compliance.pricing_transparency: Clear pricing display on paywall with auto-renewal terms, cancellation instructions, and no hidden fees. Trial terms explicitly stated with countdown timer during trial period
standards_compliance.platform_requirements: One-tap purchase restore, in-app subscription management links, proper subscription status handling, platform-compliant paywall design with required legal disclosures
standards_compliance.user_experience_standards: Paywall always dismissible, core features remain accessible without subscription, no forced upgrade loops, honest premium value communication without dark patterns
